CustomField.description: This status displays the progress of the application.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Draft - The bank record has been created but not yet completed or submitted. Awaiting Documents - All required fields have been filled, and the application is now waiting for documents upload. Submitted for Approval - The submitter has completed all steps and submitted the related case. Awaiting action from the approver. Bank Authorized - The case is approved by the designated approvers. Bank Unauthorized - The case is rejected approved by the designated approvers.
CustomField.label: Status
